section.title: S1000D XML File Explanation
section.para: The provided S1000D XML file is a standardized format for creating and sharing technical documentation, particularly in the aerospace and defense industries. This document provides an explanation of the structure and content of the XML file.

section.title: Structure
section.para: The XML file consists of the following main sections:

listItem.para: dmodule: The root element of the XML file.
identAndStatus: Contains identification and status information about the document.
content: Holds the actual content of the document, including procedures, figures, and tables.

section.title: Content Section
section.para: The content section is divided into several subsections:

listItem.para: procedure: Describes a specific task or procedure to be performed.

section.title: Procedure Section
section.para: The procedure section is further divided into:

listItem.para: proceduralStep: A single step within the procedure.
para: A paragraph of text describing the step.
proceduralStepAlts: Alternative steps or variations for a specific procedural step.

section.title: Figures and Tables
section.para: The XML file also includes figures and tables, which are referenced throughout the document:

listItem.para: figure: An image or illustration used to support the text.
table: A table of data used to provide additional information.

section.title: Example Use Cases
section.para: The provided XML file can be used as a template for creating technical documentation in various industries, such as:

proceduralStep.para: Remove the lighting system from the packaging.
